snippet: Campuses that once turned a cold shoulder to the military are now inviting former top officers, like Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal, to come and teach.
abstract: Gen Stanley A McChrystal is one of several retired generals who have been hired by universities to teach classes; trend highlights how attitudes on college campuses toward the military have changed since the Vietnam War era.
lead_paragraph: Campuses that once turned a cold shoulder to the military are now inviting former top officers, like Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal, to come and teach.

headline.seo: Retired Military Officers Teaching at Ivy League Schools
headline.main: After War Room, Heading Ivy League Classroom
headline.print_headline: After War Room, Heading Ivy League Classroom
